T02D2654:308a-0: @308a # // bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2654:308a-1: sgrub po dam tshig ldan pa yis //
T02D2654:308a-2: dgon pa'am grong mtha' la sogs par //
T02D2654:308a-3: khrus byas gtsang mar yongs byas te //
T02D2654:308a-4: bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas nas //
T02D2654:308a-5: rang lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka ru //
T02D2654:308a-6: padma zla ba'i steng du h'um //
T02D2654:308a-8: bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D2654:308a-9: spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa las //
T02D2654:308a-10: bdun po rnam par dag pa bya //
T02D2654:308a-11: tshad med bzhi dang ldan par ni //
T02D2654:308a-12: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
T02D2654:308a-13: sems kyis bsgom par bya ba yin //
T02D2654:308a-14: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D2654:308a-15: rang rig sa bon de dbus su //
T02D2654:308a-16: bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya bca' //
T02D2654:308a-17: de nas rang gi sa bon dang //
T02D2654:308a-18: phyag mtshan phyag rgyas de byin brlab //
T02D2654:308a-19: de rnams gyur pa mi 'khrugs pa //
T02D2654:308a-20: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo //
T02D2654:308a-21: g-yon pa pad gzhag rdo rje dang //
T02D2654:308a-22: g-yas pa sa gnon tshul can bsgom //
T02D2654:308a-23: ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
T02D2654:308a-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2654:308a-25: rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2654:308a-26: mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsgom //
T02D2654:308a-27: rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms la bstim //
T02D2654:308a-28: thugs kar pad zla h'um las ni //
T02D2654:308a-29: dbus su mi 'khrugs pa nyid bsgom //
T02D2654:308a-30: phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya //
T02D2654:308a-31: mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa dang //
T02D2654:308a-32: gnyis su mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2654:308a-33: de ltar thun bzhi'i rim pa ni //
T02D2654:308a-34: bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis //
T02D2654:308a-35: gang 'dod pa yi don du ni //
T02D2654:308a-36: sgrub pa las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D2654:308a-37: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2654:308a-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
